ezvcard.util

Class CharIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ezvcard.util.CharIterator

  • public class CharIterator
extends Object
    Iterates over the characters in a String. Provides additional functionality over CharSequence.chars().
    Author:
    Michael Angstadt

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CharIterator(String s) 
      CharIterator(String s, int startIndex) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean hasNext()
      Determines if there are more characters to iterate over.
      int index()
      Gets the index of the current character in the string.
      char next()
      Advances to the next character.
      char prev()
      Gets the previous character.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CharIterator

        public CharIterator(String s)
        Parameters:
        s - the string to iterate over

      • CharIterator

        public CharIterator(String s,
                    int startIndex)
        Parameters:
        s - the string to iterate over
        startIndex - the index to start at

    • Method Detail

      • hasNext

        public boolean hasNext()
        Determines if there are more characters to iterate over.
        Returns:
        true if there are more characters, false if not

      • next

        public char next()
        Advances to the next character.
        Returns:
        the next character

      • prev

        public char prev()
        Gets the previous character.
        Returns:
        the previous character or 0 if the iterator is at the beginning of the string

      • index

        public int index()
        Gets the index of the current character in the string.
        Returns:
        the index
